item.title: 002 Find Equation of Random Line
item.description: Find Equation of the Line Last video, we graphed a line based on an equation. In this video, I show you how to find an equation of a line. [embed]https://youtu.be/Fq3eKsZ3lGs[/embed]

item.title: 001 Linear Equations - College Algebra
item.description: The first of many quick and dirty college algebra refresher tutorials. I plan on doing most of these with beer in hand and ad hoc. [embed]https://youtu.be/Q4jMq6rZHTU[/embed]
